thread.title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces Release of New Chrome Watches with Dial Images of Famous Landmarks and Sites of the World for the 2015 Holiday Season!
thread.title_full: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces Release of New Chrome Watches with Dial Images of Famous Landmarks and Sites of the World for the 2015 Holiday Season!

author: prbuzz.com
title: WatchBuddy® Timepieces announces Release of New Chrome Watches with Dial Images of Famous Landmarks and Sites of the World for the 2015 Holiday Season!
text:
Los Angeles, CA (PRBuzz) October 26, 2015 -- WatchBuddy® Timepieces - one of the nation’s finest brands of Theme Watches and Wall Clocks ( www.lovableproducts.com ) -- proudly announces the release of a collection of Exquisite Chrome Watches with Gorgeous Dial Images of Famous Landmarks and Sites of the World. They are great as gifts for Travel Lovers, especially for Christmas and Hanukah.
Each of these finely crafted precision timepieces is graced with a beautiful dial picture of a famous Landmark or Site of the World, such as:
The Eiffel Tower, The Arc de Triumph, The Cathedral of Notre Dame, Diamond Head & Waikiki Beach Hawaii, The Matterhorn, Mount Fuji, Mount Kilimanjaro, Machu Picchu, Angkor Watt, Jerusalem, The Statue of David and the Pieta by Michelangelo, The Tower of Pisa, The Coliseum, St. Peter’s Basilica, Saint Marco’s Cathedral & Plaza, The Sydney Opera House, Ayer’s Rock, Saint Basil, The Kremlin, The Taj Mahal, The White House, The Capital Building, The Lincoln Memorial, The Statue of Liberty, The Grand Canyon, El Capitan Yosemite, The Golden Gate Bridge, Parliament & Big Ben, London Tower, London Bridge, Stonehenge, The Sphinx and Great Pyramid, and many, many others!
Thus WatchBuddy® Timepieces magically transforms watches from mere timepieces into delightful and joyful Icons of Travel that will thrill everyone who loves and/or dreams to travel and see the beautiful sites of the World!
For further information about these WatchBuddy – Chrome Watches please visit: www.lovableproducts.com (the search tool in the right upper hand corner is very helpful, use keywords: Chrome Watch plus the Landmark, Monument, Site or Travel Icon desired).
WatchBuddy Watch and Clocks are also featured on many major online shopping venues such as Amzon.com. Most noteworthy is that WatchBuddy’s Store - All Lovable Products by WatchBuddy – is one of the highest rated seller’s on Amazon.com based on Customer Satisfaction Ratings and Customer Service Metrics.
_ _ _ _
About WatchBuddy® Brand Products:
WatchBuddy® is a registered trademark brand of watches, jewelry and fashion accessories held by GreatMerchants.com, Inc., a large group of web based and brick & mortar businesses bringing unique, innovative and creative products and services to consumers.
